qas.question: When does the final take place?

answers.text: The final is normally held the Saturday after the Premier League season finishes in May.

qas.question: Was there a time this was not the case?

answers.text: in recent times when this pattern was not followed were 1999–2000
most rounds were played a few weeks earlier than normal as an experiment
the FA Cup Final was played before the Premier League season had finished, to allow Wembley Stadium to be ready for the UEFA Champions League final

plausible_answers.text: the Saturday after the Premier League season finishes in May

qas.question: When does the final never take place?

plausible_answers.text: the Saturday after the Premier League season finishes in May

qas.question: When is the UEFA Champions League normally held?
In what season was the UEFA Champions League not held on the normal day?
When was the final played early so that England could prepare for the UEFA Champions League?
What season were the European Championships played early as an experiment?

context: <a0_0> Trận chung kết thường được tổ chức <b5_0><b6_0> thứ bảy sau khi mùa giải Premier League kết thúc vào tháng 5 <b6_0/><b5_0/> . <a0_0/> Các mùa duy nhất <a1_0> trong thời gian gần đây khi mẫu này không được theo sau <b7_0><b9_0> 1999–2000 <b9_0/><b7_0/><a1_0/> , khi nào <a2_0> hầu hết các vòng thi đấu sớm hơn một vài tuần so với bình thường <a2_0/> và <a3_0> 2010–11 và 2012–13 <a3_0/> khi nào <a4_0> Trận chung kết FA Cup được tổ chức trước khi mùa giải Premier League kết thúc, để cho phép Wembley Stadium sẵn sàng cho trận chung kết UEFA Champions League <a4_0/> , cũng như trong <b8_0> 2011–12 <b8_0/> để cho phép nước Anh chuẩn bị cho giải vô địch châu Âu mùa hè đó.
